channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump seeks to match US drug costs with cheaper ones abroad
item.description: He said in a social media post that pharmaceutical prices could drop 30% to 80%.

item.title: Dow futures and the dollar surge as Wall Street cheers U.S.-China tariff talks
item.description: The U.S.-China tariff negotiations appeared to yield "a broad framework under which the two nations can conduct further talks," an analyst said.

item.title: ‘Size does not matter’: Bhutan’s tiny sovereign wealth fund banks on green energy and Bitcoin
item.description: Bhutan wants to be known for more than just spiritual tourism and Himalayan mountains.

item.title: Stock-market bulls face inflation test this week, but trade talks may set tone
Trump says he’ll sign executive order to lower prescription-drug prices
Toyota faces biggest hit from Trump tariffs among auto companies
item.description: While Toyota has increased US production to more than half of sales in the country, it still relies on imports of key vehicle parts and models.

item.title: Musk says testing gold card visa program in ‘quiet trial’
item.description: The “gold card” program is a Trump plan that would give wealthy foreigners who can pay for it an easier path to citizenship.

item.title: U.S. and China conclude two days of ‘productive’ trade talks, Bessent says
The ‘most important consumer earnings report of the season’ lands this week
Dow futures jump more than 400 points after 'productive' U.S.-China trade talks
